DOC.brief_title: ALIMTA Plus Carboplatin Front-Line Chemotherapy Patients With Locally Advanced Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer : A Phase 2 Clinical Trial .
DOC.criteria: You diagnosis nonsmall cell lung cancer . You receive prior chemotherapy . You least one measurable lesion . You adequate performance status . You least 18 year age .
